data.meta_description: Obituary for Garwood Lovelace | Garwood Lovelace, 99, of Middletown, passed away peacefully on Saturday, October 29, 2022. He was born November 3, 1922, in Menifee County, Kentucky to Nelse and Ethel Lovelace.They were a...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Garwood Lovelace | Baker-Stevens-Parramore Funeral Home
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
